description: Bibliography for 2025 U.S. tax changes and filing requirements, grouped for Harbor Agent / Cursor ingestion.

IRS_INFLATION_2025.title: IRS – Inflation Adjustments for Tax Year 2025
IRS_INFLATION_2025.notes: Annual inflation adjustments for brackets, standard deduction, AMT, credits and thresholds for TY2025.

IRS_MILEAGE_2025.title: IRS – 2025 Standard Mileage Rates
IRS_MILEAGE_2025.notes: Standard mileage rates for business, medical, moving, and charitable driving for 2025.

IRS_RETIREMENT_LIMITS_2025.title: IRS – 2025 Retirement Contribution Limits
IRS_RETIREMENT_LIMITS_2025.notes: Cost-of-living adjustments for 401(k), IRA, SIMPLE, and catch-up contributions applicable to 2025.

IRS_ACA_2025.title: IRS – Affordable Care Act Tax Provisions (2025 updates)
IRS_ACA_2025.notes: Premium tax credit parameters and affordability percentages affecting 2025 coverage and returns.

IRS_DRAFT_FORMS_2025.title: IRS – Draft Tax Forms and Instructions (Tax Year 2025)
IRS_DRAFT_FORMS_2025.notes: Draft Forms 1040, schedules, W-2, 1099 series, K-1 and main business returns for the 2025 filing season.

IRS_TAX_PROS_ENEWS.title: IRS e-News for Tax Professionals
IRS_TAX_PROS_ENEWS.notes: Primary update channel used by preparers for real-time IRS changes, reminders, and procedural updates.

IRS_MEF_2025.title: IRS – Modernized e-File (MeF) Program and Schemas
IRS_MEF_2025.notes: XML schemas, business rules, and validations used by software vendors for TY2025 e-file submissions.

IRS_PUB_509_2025.title: IRS Publication 509 – Tax Calendars for 2025
IRS_PUB_509_2025.notes: Consolidated 2025 due dates for individuals, businesses, payroll, and excise filings.

IRS_PUB_541_2025.title: IRS Publication 541 – Partnerships
IRS_PUB_541_2025.notes: Guidance on partnership taxation, allocations, and K-1 reporting, including updates relevant to 2025.

IRS_PUB_542_2025.title: IRS Publication 542 – Corporations
IRS_PUB_542_2025.notes: Overview of corporate tax rules for C corps and S corps and their implications for shareholder reporting.

IRS_PTE_NOTICE_2024.title: IRS Notice on Pass-Through Entity (PTE) Tax Clarifications
IRS_PTE_NOTICE_2024.notes: Clarifies treatment of state PTE tax regimes and federal deductibility; impacts K-1 reporting.

IRS_EFILE_EXPANSION_ANNOUNCEMENT.title: IRS Announcement – Expansion of Electronic Filing Requirements
IRS_EFILE_EXPANSION_ANNOUNCEMENT.notes: Expands mandatory e-filing thresholds for businesses and return preparers starting with 2025 filings.

IRS_CRYPTO_RULING_2024.title: IRS Revenue Ruling on Virtual Currency / Digital Assets
IRS_CRYPTO_RULING_2024.notes: Updates treatment of cryptocurrency transactions affecting Form 8949 and related reporting.

IRS_1099_DA_FINAL_RULE.title: IRS Final Rule – Digital Asset Broker Reporting (Form 1099-DA)
IRS_1099_DA_FINAL_RULE.notes: Requires digital asset brokers to issue new Form 1099-DA, creating high-volume data for taxpayers and software.

IRS_FORM_7203_DRAFT_2025.title: IRS Draft Instructions – Form 7203 (S Corporation Shareholder Stock and Debt Basis)
IRS_FORM_7203_DRAFT_2025.notes: Tracks shareholder basis, distributions, and loss limitations for S corporation owners for 2025.

IRS_DIRECT_FILE_EXPANSION_2025.title: IRS Direct File – Expansion Announcements for 2025
IRS_DIRECT_FILE_EXPANSION_2025.notes: Describes Direct File’s state expansion, supported forms, and eligibility for the 2025 season.

TREASURY_GREENBOOK_FY2025.title: Treasury Greenbook – General Explanations of the Administration’s Fiscal Year 2025 Revenue Proposals
TREASURY_GREENBOOK_FY2025.notes: Summarizes proposed but not enacted tax changes, including corporate, individual, and high-income provisions.

HOUSE_WAYS_MEANS_DRAFT_2024_2025.title: House Ways & Means Committee – Tax Legislation Drafts and Hearing Materials (2024–2025)
HOUSE_WAYS_MEANS_DRAFT_2024_2025.notes: Committee drafts and frameworks for individual and corporate tax changes relevant to 2025 and beyond.

SENATE_FINANCE_TAX_FRAMEWORK_2024_2025.title: Senate Finance Committee – Tax Framework and Proposals (2024–2025)
SENATE_FINANCE_TAX_FRAMEWORK_2024_2025.notes: Proposals regarding expiring TCJA provisions, credits, and corporate provisions with 2025 implications.

CRS_2025_EXPIRING_PROVISIONS.title: CRS Reports – Individual and Business Tax Provisions Expiring or Changing by 2025
CRS_2025_EXPIRING_PROVISIONS.notes: Nonpartisan analysis of federal tax provisions scheduled to sunset or change by 2025.

IRS_SCHED_K1_1065_1120S_DRAFT_2025.title: IRS Draft Instructions – Schedules K-1 (Forms 1065 and 1120-S) for 2025
IRS_SCHED_K1_1065_1120S_DRAFT_2025.notes: Proposed changes to partnership and S-corp K-1 data elements and disclosure requirements for TY2025.

IRS_FORMS_8995_8995A_DRAFT_2025.title: IRS Forms 8995 and 8995-A – Qualified Business Income Deduction (draft 2025 updates)
IRS_FORMS_8995_8995A_DRAFT_2025.notes: QBI computation rules and layout for individuals receiving pass-through K-1 income.

IRS_FORM_7206_PTC_2025.title: IRS Form 7206 – Premium Tax Credit (2025 draft or final updates)
IRS_FORM_7206_PTC_2025.notes: Reconciliation of premium tax credits tied to ACA affordability for 2025 coverage.

IRS_PTE_SALT_REGS_PROPOSED.title: IRS Proposed Regulations – State and Local Tax (SALT) Cap Workarounds via PTE Taxes
IRS_PTE_SALT_REGS_PROPOSED.notes: Clarifies federal treatment of state PTE tax regimes; important for partnership and S-corp K-1 prep.

NATP_2025_UPDATES.title: National Association of Tax Professionals (NATP) – 2025 Tax Law Updates and Guidance
NATP_2025_UPDATES.notes: Practical practitioner-focused summaries of IRS changes and practice management implications.

AICPA_TAX_SECTION_2025.title: AICPA Tax Section – 2025 Filing Season Resources
AICPA_TAX_SECTION_2025.notes: Guidance, comment letters, and tools aimed at CPAs and firms regarding new and evolving requirements.

TAXPAYER_ADVOCATE_REPORTS_2024_2025.title: National Taxpayer Advocate – Annual Reports to Congress (2024–2025)
TAXPAYER_ADVOCATE_REPORTS_2024_2025.notes: Identifies systemic issues in IRS processes affecting preparers and taxpayers during filing season.

THOMSON_REUTERS_TAX_UPDATES_2025.title: Thomson Reuters / Checkpoint – 2025 Federal Tax Law Update Coverage
THOMSON_REUTERS_TAX_UPDATES_2025.notes: Enterprise-focused commentary and trackers for new federal tax changes.

BLOOMBERG_TAX_2025_TRACKER.title: Bloomberg Tax – 2025 Tax Provisions and Policy Tracker
BLOOMBERG_TAX_2025_TRACKER.notes: Tracks enacted and proposed changes affecting corporations and high-income taxpayers.

INTUIT_PROCONNECT_2025_CHANGES.title: Intuit ProConnect – 2025 Tax Law Changes and Filing Season Updates
INTUIT_PROCONNECT_2025_CHANGES.notes: Software-vendor view of key tax changes and how they map into workflow for preparers.

IRS_MEF_XSD_REPO_2025.title: IRS MeF XSD Schema Repository (Tax Year 2025)
IRS_MEF_XSD_REPO_2025.notes: The actual XSD and schema files defining machine-readable structure for e-file returns.

IRS_DIGITAL_INITIATIVES_1040.title: IRS Digital Initiatives for Individual Returns (1040 Modernization)
IRS_DIGITAL_INITIATIVES_1040.notes: Modernization efforts around digital intake, APIs, and structured data for individual returns.

IRS_DIGITAL_ASSET_RULES.title: IRS Digital Assets – Final and Proposed Rules
IRS_DIGITAL_ASSET_RULES.notes: Consolidated rules and FAQs on digital asset reporting, broker obligations, and taxpayer responsibilities.

IRS_DIRECT_FILE_DEVELOPER_DOCS.title: IRS Direct File – Developer and Technical Documentation
IRS_DIRECT_FILE_DEVELOPER_DOCS.notes: Programmatic and technical specifications for the Direct File system, relevant to integrations and AI tools.
